entry.title: Quantum Mechanics
entry.content:
The non-relativistic quantum mechanics is described by Schordinger Equations:

$$
i\hbar \frac{\partial}{\partial t} \psi(\vec{r},t) = \hat{H} \psi(\vec{r}, t)
$$
